text: michael_dawson Walt ! Walt !
REDSHIRT Stay away from the gas ! Stay there !
REDSHIRT _ Help ! Help ! Somebody help me ! Help ! Help ! Ahh , my leg ! Ah ! Ah !
dr_jack_shephard Hey you , just give me a hand ! You , come on ! Come over here , give me a hand ! On the count of three One , two , three .
claire_littleton Help ! Please help me ! Help me , please help me !
dr_jack_shephard All right , get him out of here ! Get him away from the engine ! Get him out of here !
claire_littleton Help me , please . I 'm having , I 'm having contractions .
dr_jack_shephard How many months pregnant are you ?
claire_littleton I 'm , I 'm nearly eight months .
dr_jack_shephard How far apart are they coming ?
claire_littleton I do n't know , a - a few just happened .
john_locke Hey ! Hey , hey , hey , get away from there !
gary_troup What ?
dr_jack_shephard Listen to me ! Look at me ! You 're going to be okay , do you understand me ? But you have to sit absolutely still !

dr_jack_shephard Hey , you ! Come here ! I need you to get this woman away from these fumes ! Take her over there . Stay with her . If her contractions occur any closer than three minutes apart , call out for me .
hugo_reyes Oh , you got to be kidding me .
dr_jack_shephard I 'll be right back , okay ?
claire_littleton Thank you .
hugo_reyes Hey ! What 's your name ?
dr_jack_shephard Jack .
dr_jack_shephard Stop ! Her head 's not tilted far back enough . You 're blowing air into her stomach .
boone_carlyle You sure ?
boone_carlyle That 's exactly what I was doing . I 'm a lifeguard . I 'm licensed .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah , well , you need to seriously think about giving that license back .
boone_carlyle Maybe we should do one of those hole things . You know , stick the pen in the throat ?
dr_jack_shephard Yeah , good idea . You go get me a pen .
dr_jack_shephard Come on . Come on ! Come on ! Come on !
dr_jack_shephard Big deep breaths . Take breaths !
dr_jack_shephard Move ! Move ! Move ! Get her up ! Get her out of there ! The wing !
dr_jack_shephard You okay ?
claire_littleton Yeah .
dr_jack_shephard You ? . Stay with her .
hugo_reyes Dude , I 'm not going anywhere .
boone_carlyle I did n't know which one would work best .
dr_jack_shephard They 're all good . Thanks .
dr_jack_shephard Excuse me . Did you ever use a needle ?
kate_austen What ?
dr_jack_shephard Did you ever … patch a pair of jeans ?
kate_austen I , uhm , I made the drapes in my apartment .
dr_jack_shephard That 's fantastic . Listen , do you have a second ? I could use a little help here .
kate_austen And with what ?
dr_jack_shephard With this .
dr_jack_shephard Look , I 'd do it myself , I 'm a doctor , but I just ca n't reach it .
kate_austen You want me to sew that up ?
dr_jack_shephard It 's just like the drapes , same thing .
kate_austen No , with the drapes I used a sewing machine .
dr_jack_shephard No , you can do this . I 'm telling you . If you would n't mind .
kate_austen Of course I will .
dr_jack_shephard Thank you . It 's for your hands . Save me some for the , for the wound .
kate_austen Any color preference ?
dr_jack_shephard No . Standard black .
boone_carlyle Come on .
sayid_jarrah Hey you . What 's your name ?
charlie_pace Me ? Charlie .
sayid_jarrah Charlie . We need help with the fire . No - one will see it if it is n't big .
charlie_pace Okay , I 'm on it . What 's your name ?
sayid_jarrah Sayid .
charlie_pace Sayid . I 'm on it , Sayid .
kate_austen I might throw up on you .
dr_jack_shephard You 're doing fine .
kate_austen You do n't seem afraid at all . I do n't understand that .

dr_jack_shephard Well , fear 's sort of an odd thing . When I was in residency , my first solo procedure was a spinal surgery on a 16 year old kid , a girl . And at the end , after 13 hours , I was closing her up and I , I accidentally ripped her dural sac . Shredded the base of the spine where all the nerves come together , membrane as thin as tissue . And so it ripped open . And the nerves just spilled out of her like angel hair pasta , spinal fluid flowing out of her and I … And the terror was just so … crazy . So real . And I knew I had to deal with it . ( He 's crying ) . So I just made a choice . I 'd let the fear in , let it take over , let it do its thing , but only for five seconds , that 's all I was going to give it . So I started to count One , two , three , four , five . Then it was gone . I went back to work , sewed her up and she was fine .
kate_austen If that had been me , I think I would have run for the door .
dr_jack_shephard No , I do n't think that 's true . You 're not running now .
sayid_jarrah You think they would have come by now .
charlie_pace Huh ? Who ?
sayid_jarrah Anyone .
shannon_rutherford As if I 'm going to start eating chocolate .
boone_carlyle Shannon , we may be here for a while .
shannon_rutherford The plane had a black box , idiot . They know exactly where they are , they 're coming . I 'll eat on the rescue boat . . I 'll . Eat . On . The . Rescue . Boat .
hugo_reyes Hungry ?
claire_littleton Yeah , thanks .
hugo_reyes Anymore , uh ... you know , baby stuff ?
claire_littleton No . I'm - I'm okay .
hugo_reyes Well , hang in there .
claire_littleton Yeah , you too .
michael_dawson You sure you 're warm enough ?
jinsoo_kwon 내 옆에서 없어지면 안 돼. 내가 어디로 가든지 꼭 따라와. 알겠지 ? 다른 사람 신경쓰지 말고 우린 같이 있어야 돼.
kate_austen Do you think he 's going to live ?
dr_jack_shephard Do you know him ?
kate_austen He was sitting next to me .
dr_jack_shephard We must have been at about 40,000 feet when it happened . Hit an air pocket . Dropped , maybe , 200 feet . The turbulence was … I blacked out .
kate_austen I did n't . I saw the whole thing . I knew that the tail was gone , but I could n't bring myself to look back . And then the , the front of the plane broke off .
dr_jack_shephard Well , it 's not here on the beach . Neither is the tail . We need to figure out which way we came in .
kate_austen Why ?
dr_jack_shephard Because there 's a chance we could find the cockpit . If it 's intact , we might be able to find a transceiver . Send out a signal , help the rescue party find us .
kate_austen How do you know all that ?
dr_jack_shephard Took a couple flying lessons . Was n't for me .
kate_austen I saw some smoke . Just through the valley . If you 're thinking about going for the cockpit , I 'm going with you .
dr_jack_shephard I do n't know your name .
kate_austen I 'm Kate .
dr_jack_shephard Jack .
shannon_rutherford What was that ?
charlie_pace That was weird , right ?
walt_lloyd Is that Vincent ?
michael_dawson It 's not Vincent .
claire_littleton Did anybody see that ?
hugo_reyes Yeah .
shannon_rutherford Boone !
charlie_pace Terrific .
cindy_chandler So , how 's the drink ?
dr_jack_shephard It 's good .
cindy_chandler That was n't a very strong reaction .
dr_jack_shephard Well , it 's not a very strong drink .
cindy_chandler Shhh . Just do n't tell anyone .
dr_jack_shephard This of course breaks some critical FAA regulations .
charlie_pace Excuse me .
cindy_chandler Sir , excuse me !
rose_nadler Guess he really had to go .
cindy_chandler Sir , excuse me !
cindy_chandler Ladies and gentleman , the pilot has switched on the """" fasten seatbelt """" sign . Please return to your seats and fasten your seatbelts .
dr_jack_shephard It 's normal .
rose_nadler Oh , I know . I 've just never been a very good flier . My husband keeps reminding me that planes want to be in the air .
dr_jack_shephard Well , he sounds like a very smart man .
rose_nadler Be sure and tell him that when he gets back from the bathroom .
dr_jack_shephard Well , I 'll keep you company until he does . Do n't worry it 's going to be over ... .
michael_dawson It did n't sound like an animal . Not exactly , I mean .
rose_nadler That sound that it made , I keep thinking that there was something really familiar about it .
shannon_rutherford Really ? Where are you from ?
rose_nadler The Bronx .
charlie_pace Might be monkeys . It 's monkeys , right ?
james_ford Sure it 's monkeys . It 's Monkey Island .
hugo_reyes Technically , you know , we do n't even know if we 're on an island .
sayid_jarrah We 're on an Island .
kate_austen You ready ?
dr_jack_shephard Kate , you showed me where the smoke was . I can get there myself .
kate_austen I 'm coming .
dr_jack_shephard Well , you 're going to need better shoes .
michael_dawson Whatever it was … it was n't natural .
charlie_pace Does anyone have any sun block ?
shannon_rutherford Yeah , I do .
charlie_pace Ah . Cool .
hugo_reyes So , I was just looking inside the fuselage … It 's pretty grim in there . You think we should do something about the , uh … b - o - d - y - s ?
michael_dawson What are you spelling , man ? """" Bodies """" ?
walt_lloyd B - o - d - i - e - s .
sayid_jarrah That sounds like a good idea .
shannon_rutherford No ! They 'll deal with it when they get here .

dr_jack_shephard We go out and look for the cockpit . See if we can find a transceiver , to send a distress signal , help the rescue team . ( To Boone ) You 're going to need to keep an eye on the wounded . If the guy in the suit wakes up , try to keep him calm , but do n't let him remove that piece of shrapnel . You understand ?
boone_carlyle Yeah , got it . What about the guy with the leg ? The , the tourniquet .
dr_jack_shephard I stopped the bleeding . I took it off last night . He … he should be all right .
boone_carlyle Yeah . Cool . Good job .
charlie_pace I 'll come with you . I want to help .
dr_jack_shephard I do n't need any more help .
charlie_pace No , it 's cool , I do n't really feel like standing still , so . Excellent .
kate_austen May I ask you something ?
charlie_pace Me ? I 'd be thrilled . I 've been waiting .
kate_austen Have we ever met , anywhere ?
charlie_pace No , that would be unlikely .
kate_austen Hum .
charlie_pace I look familiar , though , right ?
kate_austen Yeah .
charlie_pace Ca n't quite place it ?
kate_austen No , I ca n't .
charlie_pace Yeah . I think I know .
kate_austen You do ?
charlie_pace You all everybody … You all everybody ! You 've never heard that song ?
kate_austen I 've heard it . I just do n't know what the hell it is—.
charlie_pace That 's us . Drive Shaft . Look , the ring — second tour of Finland . You 've never heard of Drive Shaft ?
kate_austen The band ?
charlie_pace Yeah , the band .
kate_austen You were in Drive Shaft .
charlie_pace I am in Drive Shaft . I play bass .
kate_austen Seriously ?
charlie_pace Yeah , Charlie . Track 3 , you know , I do backing vocals .
kate_austen My friend Beth would freak . She loved you guys .
charlie_pace Give me Beth 's number , I 'll call her , I 'd , I 'd love to .
dr_jack_shephard Hey—.
charlie_pace Does she live nearby ?
kate_austen Have you ever heard of Drive Shaft ?
charlie_pace You all everybody ... You all every ... body .
dr_jack_shephard We 've got to keep moving .
kate_austen They were good .
charlie_pace They are good . We 're still together . In the middle of a comeback .
charlie_pace Hey guys , is this normal ? Kind of ... day turning into night , you know ? End of the world type weather . Is this — guys ?
hugo_reyes I do n't know if you want to go in there ! There 's too many bodies .
claire_littleton There it is again .
rose_nadler Oh my god .
dr_jack_shephard Well ? Let 's do this .
charlie_pace Let 's get this trans … .
dr_jack_shephard Transceiver .
charlie_pace Transceiver thing and get out of here .
dr_jack_shephard Come on ! Come ... .
dr_jack_shephard You okay ?
kate_austen Yeah . You ?
dr_jack_shephard Yeah .
charlie_pace I 'm fine . Charlie 's fine , by the way . Okay ?
dr_jack_shephard Hey . You do n't have to come up here .
kate_austen No , I 'm good .
kate_austen So , what does a transceiver look like ?
dr_jack_shephard Complicated walkie - talkie .
dr_jack_shephard Hey ! Can you hear me ? I need that water . Here . Here you go . Hey .
PILOT How many survived ?
dr_jack_shephard At least 48 . Does anything feel broken ?
PILOT No , no . Just my head 's a little dizzy , that 's all .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah . It 's probably a concussion .
PILOT How long has it been ?
dr_jack_shephard Sixteen hours .
PILOT Sixteen ? Has anybody come ?
dr_jack_shephard Not yet .

PILOT Six hours in , our radio went out . No - one could see us . We turned back to land in Fiji . By the time we hit turbulence , we … we were a thousand miles off course . They 're looking for us in the wrong place .
PILOT We have a transceiver .
dr_jack_shephard Good . Good , that 's what we were hoping . Listen , you should n't try to move .
PILOT No , no . I 'm okay . It 's okay . Transceiver 's right there . It 's right there .
dr_jack_shephard Where 's Charlie ?
PILOT It 's not working .
kate_austen Charlie ?
kate_austen What were you doing in the bathroom ?
charlie_pace What ?
PILOT What the hell was that ?
dr_jack_shephard Kate .
kate_austen It 's right outside .
PILOT What , what 's right outside ?
dr_jack_shephard Shhhh .
charlie_pace What the hell just happened ?
kate_austen Jack , come on !
charlie_pace Just leave it !
charlie_pace Hey !
dr_jack_shephard Okay , let 's run .
kate_austen J - J - J ... Jaaaack ! One ! Two ! Three ! Four ! Five !
charlie_pace Kate !
kate_austen Where the hell is Jack ?
charlie_pace I do n't know !
kate_austen Did you see him ?
charlie_pace Yeah , he pulled me up !
kate_austen Where is he ?
charlie_pace I do n't know !
kate_austen How can you not know ?
charlie_pace We got separated ! Look , I … I fell down , and he , he came back for me , that thing was just … .
kate_austen Did you see it ?
charlie_pace No . No ! But it was right there . We were dead ! I was . An - And then Jack came back , and he , he pulled me up . I do n't know where he is .
kate_austen We have to go back for him .
charlie_pace Go back ? There ? Kate , there 's a certain gargantuan quality about this thing .
kate_austen Then do n't come .
charlie_pace Kate !
charlie_pace I heard you shout . I heard you shout """" Jack """" . I 'm Charlie , by the way .
charlie_pace What is that ?
charlie_pace What is ... .
dr_jack_shephard It 's the pilot .
kate_austen Did you see it ?
dr_jack_shephard No . It was right behind me , but ... I dove into the bushes .
charlie_pace Guys ? How does something like that happen ?
